website_summaries.verdict: This travel case fits up to 6 ties and also holds tie accessories. It's an excellent choice for the business traveler or anyone who needs a multi-purpose organizer.
pros: Impressive capacity: it can hold 6 ties, 7 tie clips, and 4 cuff links
Sturdy straps keep ties securely in place
cons: Other tie travel cases may take up a bit less space in your bag or suitcase

customer_reviews.title: Horrible cheap smell
customer_reviews.text: Look wise and practicality, I'd give this a 5 star rating. However, it reeks of cheap leather and chemicals. Even the duster bag it came in smells horrendous. After a week of airing it out, it STILL smells just as bad as the day it was delivered. I planned on putting a few ties in it and giving it as a gift but smells so bad I don't want the ties to take on that scent. Looks great but will have to be sent back.
customer_reviews.author: En

customer_reviews.title: Big and thick - and not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were lighter and less bulky. I gave this to my husband who does international travels upwards of 70% so something sturdy nut slim and light would have been better he said. Other than that, it’s great. Solid construction and good feel to the case.
customer_reviews.author: J Kim

customer_reviews.title: Always be prepared
customer_reviews.text: All of my customer interactions require a tie, but not every day at work includes customer interaction. I keep this in my car with a few select ties, some collar stays, and a few matching tie clips. I have never been caught unprepared for a surprise trip to a see a client or an unexpected visit.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I’m updating my review after excellent customer service. Originally I was pleased with the aesthetic of this case but disappointed in quality. I was sent a new tie case at my dissatisfaction and it works perfectly! Grateful to the company for a, now, aesthetically pleasing and fully functioning tie case!
customer_reviews.author: Halley Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, as I've bought more expensive ties
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, as I've bought more expensive ties, I wanted a safer way to carry them in my suitcase. This fits 3-4 ties perfectly, and they look great even after hours in the case. I do bury it at the bottom of the suitcase just in case some baggage handler get nosy. The pic was after 2 flights and an Uber.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M

customer_reviews.title: Huge. Not for travelers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely NOT for frequent travelers. You would have to leave half of your clothes behind to fit this in the luggage. And at home it has no purpose, unless you have a couple of magnificent ties you wouldn't risk to hang in closet tie hangers . Conclusion: useless!
customer_reviews.author: Kathe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the hubby for traveling and he loves it. Presentation was just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: gradstudent

customer_reviews.title: Love This Thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this... its carries my ties for travels so nicely; keep things nice and clean. I really like the build quality too. The leather is so plush. Not just ties... get it, you will see. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ravon Bobb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but ultimately Impractical
customer_reviews.text: It’s very beautiful but very large. I got it for my traveling husband. He likes it but unfortunately can’t realistically take it with him on his trips because t takes up so much space. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Over Priced, Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: This has some utility, but it's very cheap materials. The zipper is already coming loose and it's obvious that this item will last a few months at best before some part of it tears or falls apart. DO NOT PAY THE ASKING PRICE. It's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shandrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My fiance travels with his church. So I got him this so his ties will be neat, organized and wrinkle free. He loves it and uses it every time when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: fake leather outside
customer_reviews.text: Thought the whole case was leather ... it is not, just a few bits on the inside.... got for a business trip and never used because of poor quality... too late to return :-(
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for men
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for my dad and one for my grandfagther. They both love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Lucía de Hoyos

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is waaaayyy nicer than I thought! It's very sturdy and looks expensive. Everything work properly and actually slightly bigger than expected
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Nice tie case
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a high quality product a little on the small side but works well with 4 ties comfortably
customer_reviews.author: zap

customer_reviews.title: already ripped on me
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice and the strap ripped on me
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Holds 4-6 ties very nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Order for my husband to replace the old and breaking plastic cylinders that hold a rolled up tie. He says it’s just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my boyfriend, he really liked it and also noticed the custom letter on it as well, which made it an even nicer gift. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really well build, and it is a LOT cheaper than buying it from Jcrew.
customer_reviews.author: DavidAndIan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ties neat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product. Would make a good gift. Does the job. Hubby is happy.
customer_reviews.author: pstromby

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed by the overall quality of this. Gave it as a gift to my fiance who just began traveling for work. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case!
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the money. Well made and sturdy. Didn’t notice any issue with the smell (as mentioned in the one-star review)...and I have a good sniffer!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hauck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything from the stitching to the material is of great quality. I’m really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Afalla

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Way too bulky. Wanted to return it but couldn’t because outside return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent quality
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality and great gift for the business traveler. Luxury through and through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tie Case Vegan Leather Travel - 6 Neck Tie Organizer by Case Elegance
feature_bullets: Luxurious - We designed this tie case to epitomize luxury with its rich two tone leather and heat pressed Case Elegance logo. Only our tie case can properly compliment your fine silk neck threads.
Spacious - This tie case is carefully crafted to hold up to six neck ties, 2 sets of cufflinks and 7 tie clips. This is the true all-in-one suit accessory companion.
Durable - Our choice of vegan leather exterior will prove not only soft to the touch, but its durability will guarantee years of quality use.
Carefully Designed - Every detail has been carefully chosen from the vegan leather accented zipper pull to the elastic straps, silver button snaps, and soft black felt that protects your accessories.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
